author: Hero Hei
description:
A number of English Voice Actors, Corporate Journalists, and some of their bootlickers have recently launched a campaign against Larian Studios, the devs behind Baldur's Gate and Divinity. However, things aren't going so well for them to say the least.

title: These Voice Actors Tried to Cancel Larian (they failed)
